ch.aplu.tcp

Class TcpNodeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.tcp.TcpNodeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TcpNodeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TcpNodeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TcpNodeListener
    Empty implementations of the TcpNodeListener interface. Keep in mind, that the order of the callback calls is not previsible.
